thread.title: Cenobio Chapa
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Cenobio Chapa

author: Cenobio Chapa
title: Cenobio Chapa
text:
The crew that deliverd our furniture were the best I ever saw. They were fast but took care care not not damage any of my belongings. They were very clean took time to put on booties. Very respectful and they had a good sense of humor. Cleaned up all package martial even went as far as to run down street to get wrapper that had blown away.
By far best delivery crew I have ever dealt with.
